name: Disney Challenge 2 Quiz | Movie Mixture | 25 Questions

questions.text: In which city is 'The Hunchback of Notre Dame' set?
questions.explanation:
Paris.

	Quasimodo, a simpleminded hunchback is raised in isolation in a cathedral belltower in Paris.

questions.text: Which Disney film features the songs 'Never Smile at a Crocodile', 'A Pirate's Life' and 'The Second Star to the Right'?
In which Disney film would you meet Anita, Roger and Nanny?
questions.explanation:
101 Dalmatians.

	Joely Richardson played Anita, Jeff Daniels played Roger and Joan Plowright played Nanny.

questions.text: Who starts to yearn for a family in 'The Tigger Movie'?
questions.explanation:
Tigger.

	Tigger, who always boasts he is the only one starts to yearn for a family and is helped by his friends at the Hundred-Acre Wood.

questions.text: In 'Tarzan' which artiste provided the pulsating rhythm of his songs during the film?
Which film is a remake of the 1961 Disney film, 'The Absent-Minded Professor?
questions.explanation:
Flubber.

	A chronically distracted college professor accidentally creates a green goo called Flubber which when applied to any object causes it to fly.

questions.text: In 'A Goofy Movie', what is the name of Goofy's son who he takes on a fishing trip in an effort to bond even though the boy would rather spend time with his girlfriend?
The characters in 'Hercules' are unique in design thanks to the distinctive style of which noted British cartoonist?
In which Disney film features 'The Twilight Bark' consisting of a dog named Colonel, a horse called The Captain and a cat named Tibbs?
questions.explanation:
101 Dalmatians.

	The Twilight Bark send a relay of signals from London to the countryside where they find the puppies locked up in the deserted De Vil mansion.

questions.text: In which Disney film do we meet the characters of Gaston, Mrs. Potts, Lumiere, Cogsworth and Chip?
questions.explanation:
Beauty and the Beast.

	Angela Lansbury is the voice behind Mrs. Potts.

questions.text: Who provided the voice of Mushu, Mulan's guardian dragon in 'Mulan'?
What is the name of the mermaid played by Daryl Hannah in 'Splash'(1984)?
questions.explanation:
Madison.

	Madison surfaces in New York City to pursue the man she loves.

questions.text: In 'Mulan', a young girl named Mulan disguises herself as a man and joins the Emperor's army to fight the marauding ... ?
In which Disney film does Barbie appear voiced by Jodi Benson?
In 'A Bug's Life', who provided the voice of Hopper the vicious grasshopper?
Which of the following is a character in 'The Hunchback of Notre Dame'?
questions.explanation:
Laverne.

	Laverne was one of the gargoyles. The evil minister was Frollo. Phoebus and Clopin were the other characters. Phobos is the larger of the two satellites of Mars and Chopin was a Polish composer and pianist.

questions.text: What is the name of the youngest ant in the colony in 'A Bug's Life'?
What is Jane's surname in 'Tarzan'?
Which film starred Roddy McDowall as Mr. Jelk and David Tomlinson as Emelius Browne?
questions.explanation:
Bedknobs and Broomsticks.

	Angela Lansbury starred as Eglantine Price.

questions.text: Who is the Narrator of the Tigger Movie?
In 'Hercules', Meg is an unusual heroine as she is wry, smartalecky and never at a loss for a put-down of Hercules. What in the film is Meg short for?
questions.explanation:
Megara.

	Megara is a town in east central Greece, an ancient trading city which founded many colonies in the 7th and 8th centuries BC.

questions.text: In '101 Dalmatians', Pongo, Perdita and the puppies watch their favourite television star who is called ... ?
questions.explanation:
Thunderbolt.

	The television show Thunderbolt is sponsored by Kanine Krunchies. Later the villains Jasper and Horace pass the time at the lonely mansion by watching the television programme 'What's My Crime'.

questions.text: In 'Mulan', whose voice provides singing Shang?
In 'The Lion King', name baby Simba's parents. Mufasa and ... ?
In 'The Little Mermaid II' (Return To The Sea), what is the name of Ariel and Eric's daughter?
questions.explanation:
Melody.

	Hope you enjoyed the quiz and the memories of the magic of Disney live on.
